title: The Princess Switch Is Getting a Sequel, and One More Vanessa Hudgens
text:
Photo: Netflix

You better dust off an old Chicago baseball hat in celebration. Wait, you know nothing about Chicago? You do now! Netflix confirmed today that Vanessa Hudgens will be returning for a sequel to one of the most bizarrely memorable Christmas movies in recent history, The Princess Switch. Per THR, the film, titled Switched Again, will follow Duchess Margaret (Hudgens) as she

“unexpectedly inherits the throne to Montenaro and hits a rough patch with Kevin,” her cute baker boyfriend. It’s up to her double-pal Stacy from Chi City (also Hudgens) to save the day before a new lookalike, party girl Fiona (also Hudgens, again), “foils their plans.” It’s expected to be released in late 2020, because, frankly, when else would you wanna watch it?
description: Vanessa Hudgens will be starring in a Princess Switch sequel on Netflix, which will include another person to switch.
